title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.

title: Company Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to visualise company members and their roles.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Happiness data visualisation
description: A website that gets happiness, gdp and generosity data from various countries and visualises it through scattered graphs.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Book Analysis
description: Analysing book data with regular expressions, sentiment analysis through chapters.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: Helper Chatbot
description: A chatbot that knows about a specific topic and answers questions regarding that topic.

description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Translator API
description: A program built with Flask that gives a definition for any typed word.

title: News API
description: The Flask app that access news about a particular topic and sends it by email.

title: Visualizing Data
description: An app built with Streamlit and natural language toolkit that visualizes positivity and negativity through date periods collected from a diary.

title: Visualizing Weather Forecast
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

title: Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability.

title: Job Application Form
description: A job application form built with Django.

title: Online Store
description: Currently building a Django Unicorn items online shop app where users can place orders and sellers can manage them.
